text: Celebrities Nightclub, or simply Celebrities, is a gay bar and nightclub in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. The club opened in 1978, and underwent a $1 million renovation in 2013. The venue is recognized by the Vancouver Heritage Foundation. ==References== Category:1978 establishments in Canada Category:LGBT culture in Vancouver Category:LGBT nightclubs in Canada Category:Nightclubs in Vancouver
title: Celebrities Nightclub
